column4: Hi...irc seems missing from my version of Empathy.  How do I add it?

Empathy is a terrible IRC client - there is a "bug" where you need to add another type of account prior to being able to use IRC.  My recommendation however is to use a real IRC client - xchat is a popular GUI client.
actually "sudo apt-get updage && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade" would be normal - i think safe-upgrade is only available with aptitude
actually you have it backwards - ubuntu has dropped aptitude from 10.10 by default
